main event: Several residents observed an unidentified flying object in New Milford, Connecticut on July 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes moving from the southern horizon to the northern horizon before rising and becoming brighter., The object reversed course and descended rapidly overhead before disappearing from view., A letter from a local resident expressed concern and curiosity about the nature of the object they witnessed., The sky conditions were clear at the time of the sighting., The case was marked as insufficient data for evaluation, pending further investigation.
witness description: local residents, including a concerned individual and their son
